caption.title: Epidemiological curve of chikungunya cases reported at NIH, Islamabad.
caption.p: Red bars indicate the number of patients who tested positive for chikungunya RNA using real-time reverse transcriptase PCR, green squares indicate count of dengue-positive patients, and black lines represent the total number of reported cases at NIH. x-Axis shows the number of weeks, starting from week 51 in 2016 to week 14 in 2018. The mean age of chikungunya-positive patients was 31.8 Â± 15.7 years, with a male-to-female ratio of 1:1.2 ( P value = 0.53). KPK, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa; NIH, National Institute of Health.
